amendment.description: An amendment numbered 195 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to increase and decrease funding by $1,000,000 for Military Construction, Navy and Marine Corps in order to support construction projects on military facilities and facilities that serve the military community where health and safety are at risk.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Raskin amendment (A069) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Raskin amendment (A069) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A069) offered by Mr. Raskin.
